title: Champion Mastery coming to live soon!

replies.body: Now the chroma skin packs should somehow be integrated into this system, for IP or RP, I just think 590 RP is a bit too dear. But if we had to work for it, and some more thought was put in maybe it could become so much more than just buying it. Maybe make purchasing it an option or you can earn it with XP and IP. Who knows.
Unlocking Chroma Packs as you gained Mastery levels would be cool, unfortunately it would be difficult to work in with the skin Chroma packs as well as base skins.
More reasons to main teemo, thanks rito!
oh gwad, pls play someone SKILLED i beg of u
I can't take you seriously about this when your name has Master Yi in it.
im thinking of changing username, shat xD
every champion requires skill whether its urgot or master yi people just think they are broken because they are not good enough to vs them
master yi is literally only Q and ult. thats it

Maybe in your Elo it is, but there's a lot more to Master Yi than that.

e.g. timing Q to dodge projectiles, timing W to block damage, using W as an autoattack reset, correctly positioning yourself to maximise damage dealt via stutter steps and well timed Qs, and more.

What's more, a skilled Master Yi can solo dragon at level 3 and do an early baron (sometimes even solo). It's all about using Q and W to dodge/absorb the damage at the right time, this isn't an easy skill to learn.

Yi isn't only about that, remember u hav to actually time everything right, i mean i havent played yi in ages! xD needing to change the name. ANYWAY when i played yi about 2 months ago (latest time) that is when i failed, so hard, i mean i fed, somehow.... YEA any way yi isn't as noob as u'd think
such a noob thing to say

Nothing wrong with Teemo. Plenty of people in high Diamond/Master main it on various servers (including OCE).
I reckon it would be awesome if the new chroma packs where a reward for maxing out a champion rather than just buying them for little RP

this is a really nice feature, but it really feels like it is coming in late for me having played around 3k games of league. i think it would be really awesome to have some kind of border flare in addition for mastering a champ when you play them as well as the title just to make it feel that little bit more special.
I hope past matches this season count.

Some mastery decay would still be nice for people that play a champ to level 5 now and then don't touch them again for a year or perhaps a reset after a kit rework.
